name: Why did the chicken cross the road? (DatJuanDesigner)
name_original: Why did the chicken cross the road? (DatJuanDesigner)
description:
Have you ever wondered why the chicken crossed the road? I think we have finally found the answer! 

Controls

  • PC : Left and Right Arrow Keys
  • Mobile: Swipe left and right to move, tap screen to advance dialog

Credits
A 5-minute game by DatJuanDesigner (website / Twitter)

Thanks to Hesi Mendez and  Jonathan Morales-Rocha for their awesome feedback that improved the game 1000 times over!

----- Don't read further until you finish the game! -----

Inspiration

  • Campesinos: Workers of the Land (art exhibition by Pajaro Valley Arts)
  • UCSC Alumni Summer Game Jam #2 (Theme: "End where you started")
  • Train by Brenda Romero
    • Brenda was actually one professors at UCSC and I had a chance to play Train in person! It was a huge inspiration for the type of games I wish to create.

Donate

If this game made you feel some sort of way, I recommend making a donation to some of these great organizations below!

  • Center for Farmworker Families
  • Digital NEST
  • Gameheads
  • RAICES - The Refugee and Immigrant Center for Education and Legal Services
  • Young Center for Immigrant Children's Rights
